36.eng-name: The Book of the Kind Treatment of Women

hadiths.text: It was narrated that 'Aishah said:"The Messenger of Allah used to divide his time equally among his wives then he would say: 'O Allah, this is what I have done with regard to that over which I have control, so do not blame me for that over which You have control and I do not.'" Hammad bin Zaid narrated it in Mursal form

chapter.ara-name: باب مَيْلِ الرَّجُلِ إِلَى بَعْضِ نِسَائِهِ دُونَ بَعْضِ
chapter.eng-name: A Man Being Inclined To Favor One Of His Wives Over Another
